meanings.definition: The leaves of a plant that have a texture similar to leather.
meanings.sent1: The leatherleaves on the tree rustled in the wind.
meanings.sent2: I collected some leatherleaves to use in my art project.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the leatherleaves to make a cozy bed.
meanings.sent4: Her hands felt like leatherleaves after working in the garden all day.
meanings.sent5: The leatherleaves glistened with dew in the morning sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of plant with leaves that resemble leather in texture.
meanings.sent1: The leatherleaves plant thrives in dry climates.
meanings.sent2: The garden center sells a variety of leatherleaves for landscaping.
meanings.sent3: The leatherleaves plant looked like a mini forest in a pot.
meanings.sent4: The leatherleaves in the botanical garden felt like a secret treasure.
meanings.sent5: The leatherleaves added a unique touch to the floral arrangement.
